mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALARY (EMPNO, ACCOUNTINGPERIOD, SALARYCATEGORY, SALARYNAME, SALARYDAY, SALARY, SALARYINFO) VALUES ( #{empNo}, #{accountingPeriod}, #{salaryCategory}, #{salaryName}, #{salaryDay}, #{salary}, #{salaryInfo} )
mapper.select: SELECT S.SALARY_NO, S.EMPNO, H.ENAME as eName, S.ACCOUNTINGPERIOD, S.SALARYCATEGORY, S.SALARYNAME, S.SALARYDAY, S.SALARY, S.SALARYINFO FROM SALARY S JOIN HRM H ON S.EMPNO = H.EMPNO
